#6C1749AragonsBow.espIlium (ilium@kruis.nl)Endure the trials of Aragon the Battlemage and win his longbow. This bow, the "Aragon's Long Bow" is a Daedric long bow with the capability to conjure it's own arrows. Ask around in Molag Mar to find the stronghold of Aragon.
